description:
The homeless and desperate Koushi has been offered a job! But after a bad first impression, Atena will need time to adjust to the idea of Koushi living at the Goddess’ Dorm.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Koushi Becomes a Dorm Mother / The Problem with Mineru and Frey
Koushi wird Hausmutter / Mineru und Frey haben ihre Gründe
Koushi, Ryoubo ni Naru / Mineru to Frey, Wakeari
Kôshi devient gouvernante / Mineru et Frey posent problème
孝士, 寮母になる / みねるとフレイ, ワケあり
